Package Com.DAO

Interface DBHelper

  • public interface DBHelper
    This interface contain useful methods that handling SQL Database CRUD in this application.

    • Method Summary

      Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean checkUserCredentials​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      This method will check if user input is matching the credentials in Database.

    • Method Detail

      • insertAppointment

        static int insertAppointment​(java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String description,
                             java.lang.String type,
                             java.lang.String location,
                             java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                             java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                             int user_ID,
                             int customer_ID,
                             int contact_ID)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method insert an appointment into appointments table in the Database.
        Parameters:
        title - appointment title
        contact_ID - contact ID
        customer_ID - customer ID
        description - appointment description
        end - appointment end datetime
        location - appointment location
        start - appointment start datetime
        type - appointment type
        user_ID - user ID
        Returns:
        1 for successful insertion 0 for fail insertion
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • insertCustomer

        static int insertCustomer​(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String address,
                          java.lang.String postalCode,
                          java.lang.String phone,
                          int divisionID)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method insert a customer into customers table in the Database.
        Parameters:
        name - customer name
        address - customer address
        divisionID - FirstLevelDivision ID
        phone - customer phone number
        postalCode - customer postal code
        Returns:
        1 for successful insertion 0 for fail insertion
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

                                    java.lang.String password)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method will check if user input is matching the credentials in Database.
        Parameters:
        password - user password
        username - user username
        Returns:
        boolean true for match false for mismatch
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
